summary:
This mod will add three ring in the game which can be forge at any blacksmith forge under jewelry section.The each ring on equipment gives you three different dwarven automation follower.They can follow you anywhere and fight for you. use one ring at a one time.
if you don\'t want them follow you just unequipped the ring.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add three ring in the game which can be forge at any blacksmith forge under jewelry section.The each ring on equipment gives you three different dwarven automation follower.They can follow you anywhere and fight for you. use one ring at a one time.
if you don\'t want them follow you just unequipped the ring.

Ingredients required to get the ring are as follows

Dwarven Centurion Summon ring requires

2 Dwemer lever, 2 Dwemer Gyro, 1 Dwarven oil, 1 Dwarven Scrap metal.

Dwarven Sphere Summon ring requires

1 Dwemer lever, 1 Dwemer Gyro, 1 Dwarven oil, 1 Dwarven Scrap metal.

Dwarven Spider Summon ring requires

1 Dwemer lever, 1 Dwemer Gyro, 1 Dwarven oil, 1 Dwarven Scrap metal.

Installation

Remove earlier version of this mode if you have and then save. put extracted file into your data folder.


Future plans

.Adding more creatures as followers
.Summoning more than 1 creature at the same time.
.And many more.
Let me know any bugs you encountered while playing.

Your comments will be appreciated.
author: Praveen
